label: Set up and configure the core financial modules. (25-30%)

skills.label: Define and configure the General ledger module.
items: Define currency and exchange rates
Define and create the chart of accounts and main accounts
Set up and manage fiscal and ledger calendars
Create and define financial dimensions and financial dimension sets
Configure account structure
Define the ledger for a legal entity
Set up journals
Define the general ledger parameters and accounts for automatic transactions
Configure intercompany accounting

skills.label: Explain and set up the Cash and bank management module.
items: Explain bank transaction types and transaction groups
Set up bank groups, create bank accounts, explain the cash and bank management parameters
Configure check layouts

skills.label: Describe and design the Accounts receivable and Collections management modules.
items: Describe customer posting profiles, set up customer payment information, create customers, define the accounts receivable parameters, describe an organizational structure for centralized payments
Set up and process collection letters, configure and calculate interest, process interest adjustments, set up customer pools and aging period definitions

skills.label: Review and build the Accounts payable module.
items: Define vendor posting profiles, configure vendor payment information, explain invoice matching
Create vendors, walkthrough the account payable parameters
Review an organizational structure for centralized payments

skills.label: Clarify and utilize the Tax module.
items: Define ledger posting groups, create sales tax codes, establish sales and item tax groups, define sales tax authorities, explain withholding tax
Review sales tax jurisdictions

skills.label: Define basic fixed asset concepts, and complete setup for the Fixed assets module.
items: Define depreciation methods and conventions, set up depreciation profiles and books, set up value models, define fixed asset parameters, create fixed assets, set up and assign bar codes to assets, lend fixed assets

label: Manage daily procedures for the core financial modules. (25-30%)

skills.label: Review and process transactions in the General ledger module.
items: Create and post general journals
Create voucher templates, process periodic journals, process period allocations, create and process accrual schemes, reverse a transaction, create reversing entries
Use ledger accrual schemes in a journal
Create and post intercompany journal entries

skills.label: Analyze and walkthrough transactions in the Cash and bank management module.
items: Create and delete checks, void a check and create payment reversals, create and cancel deposit slips, reconcile bank accounts

skills.label: Assess and handle transactions in the Accounts receivable and Collections management modules.
items: Create free text invoices, process prepayments, create payment journals, reverse settlements, reimburse a customer, perform sales order invoicing
Review aged balances for customer, process customer account statements, create write-off transactions, process a non-sufficient funds cancellation
Manage the status of customer transactions
Use cases and activities to track collection actions

skills.label: Define and create transactions in the Accounts payable module.
items: Define and create different types of invoice journals, manage vendor invoices, perform invoice matching
Process prepayments, create payment proposals
Process payment journals

skills.label: Explain and work with transactions in the Tax module.
items: Revise sales tax prior to posting a transaction, post sales tax on prepayments, create transactions with conditional sales tax

skills.label: Review and process fixed asset transactions.
items: Define transaction types available, process acquisitions through journals, process depreciations, process disposals, process value adjustments
Create purchase orders for fixed assets
Acquire fixed assets from a purchase order

label: Set up, configure, and use the Budgeting module. (20-25%)

skills.label: Define basic budgeting concepts, and setup basic budgeting features.
items: Define budget concepts
Discuss different budget types
Set up the different budget configurations, define the budget parameters

skills.label: Configure and use budget control features.
items: Set up the budget control configuration settings
Define budget groups and budget control rules
Enable budget control for source documents and journals
Activate and turn on budget control
View budget check results on transactions

skills.label: Define and generate budget plans.
items: Define budget planning configuration, create budget plans, process budget plans, modify budget plans in excel

skills.label: Create and process budget register entries.
items: Create and process budget register entries
Transfer budget balances, define budget allocations, update budget register entries in excel
Create budget register entries from budget plans

label: Manage periodic and closing procedures for the financial modules. (20-25%)

skills.label: Setup, configure, and run consolidations and eliminations.
items: Set up and define a consolidation and elimination company, add consolidation information to main accounts
Define and use consolidation groups
Configure elimination rules
Define the consolidation methods available
Perform a consolidation
Create and process eliminations

skills.label: Configure and perform foreign currency revaluations.
items: Define main account settings for foreign currency revaluation
Define the types of foreign currency revaluations
Perform foreign currency revaluations

skills.label: Set up and run ledger allocations.
items: Describe the various types of ledger allocation
Create ledger allocations rules and basis
Process ledger allocation requests
Configure allocations terms for a main account

skills.label: Construct and use the period close workspace.
items: Describe uses for the period close workspace
Configure the period close workspace
Define a period close template
Use the period close workspace

skills.label: Set and run the fiscal year end closing processes.
items: Define parameters for fiscal year end close
Configure and run the fiscal year close process
Describe and use the closing sheet
